QuestData.Title: To Zin-Azshari
QuestData.Description: We need something to deal with the guardian of the Tidestone, $n.$b$bOur new allies here say that there is a naga enclave located in the ruins of Zin-Azshari. If there is anything potent enough to counter Azshara's sorcery, it will be in the ruins of her capital city.$b$bThe First Arcanist will accompany you, champion. She will be best equipped to assist you in matters both historical and magical while you search.$b$bGood luck.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet First Arcanist Thalyssra in the ruins of Zin-Azshari.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet First Arcanist Thalyssra in the ruins of Zin-Azshari.
